title: The top 4 tech firms hired 2.2 lakh freshers in FY22; how do they plan to tackle attrition? - Business Today
content: The top 4 tech firms hired 2.2 lakh freshers in FY22; how do they plan to tackle attrition?  Business Today
description: TCS, Infosys, Wipro and HCL plan to onboard at least 1.6 lakh freshers in 2022-23
